scripts.build: npm run build:static && npm run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: node -e "const fs=require('fs-extra'); Promise.all([fs.copy('index.html','dist/index.html'), fs.copy('wedding-config.js','dist/wedding-config.js'), fs.copy('_redirects','dist/_redirects'), fs.copy('_headers','dist/_headers'), fs.copy('assets','dist/assets'), fs.copy('css','dist/css')]).then(()=>console.log('✅ Build files copied successfully!')).catch(err=>console.error('❌ Error copying files:', err));"
